property.name: Text
property.value: Steal 2M ISK from the Coffers.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Ringleaders may not be abducted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Duplicate the action of any opponent's Specialist in Night One of their Hideout.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: The chosen specialist may be in a team.

property.name: Text
property.value: Steal 1M ISK from the Coffers and 1M ISK from an opponent's Stash.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reorder the cards in any Hideout. Then steal 1M ISK from the Coffers.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Cards in the refresh area are not in a hideout

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw the Specialist on the top of the Discard Pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After playing this Specialist you may Advance Time and play another Specialist immediately.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Cards in your refresh area do not return to your hand until the end of your turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw three Specialists. Choose one to add to your hand, and discard the other two.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Ringleaders may not be abducted

property.name: Text
property.value: Swap a completed Job card from your Stash for a completed Job card of your choice in an opponent's Stash.

property.name: Text
property.value: Steal 1M ISK from every opponent's Stash.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw two Specialists, choose one to add to your hand and discard the other. Then steal 1M ISK from the coffers.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal a Specialist from your hand and immediately Duplicate its action. Then return it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may Duplicate the action of a Specialist in your Hideout that is not in a Team.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Cards in the refresh area are not in a hideout

property.name: Text
property.value: Steal 2M ISK from an opponent's Stash

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Ringleaders may not be abducted

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw one Specialist and Abduct one random Specialist from an opponent's hand. Choose one to keep and give the other to your chosen opponent.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Ringleaders may not be abducted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Team up a card with the Thug. Steal 1M ISK from every opponent's Stash for each Specialist in their Hideout that has the same Skill as that card and is not part of a Team.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a Specialist in your Refresh Area. Team up that Specialist with the Middle Man and immediately take its action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a Team in your Hideout. Return all but one Specialist from that Team to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Steal 1M ISK from every opponent's Stash for each Team in their Hideout

property.name: Text
property.value: Abduct any Specialist in an opponent's Hideout, and immediately play that Specialist. Replace the Abducted Specialist with this card.

property.name: Subtext
property.value: Acts as any single skill type in a team. Ringleaders may not be abducted. This card may not be duplicated.
